    • addTicketToCart

      public boolean addTicketToCart​(java.util.UUID ticketId)
      Adds the ticket to the user's cart.
      Parameters:
      ticketId - ID of a ticket which will be added to the user's cart
      Returns:
      True, if the ticket was successfully added to the user's cart, false otherwise

    • getCartContent

      public CartResponse getCartContent()
      Returns:
      Returns current content of the user's cart
      See Also:
      CartResponse

    • removeTicketFromCart

      public boolean removeTicketFromCart​(java.util.UUID ticketId)
      Removes the ticket from the user's cart.
      Parameters:
      ticketId - ID of the ticket which will be removed from the user's cart
      Returns:
      Returns true, if the ticket was successfully removed from the cart, false otherwise

    • checkout

      public UserOrder checkout​(CheckoutRequest request)
      Checkouts cart.
      Parameters:
      request - Request which contains additional informations about checkout
      Returns:
      Returns UserOrder which contains ordered tickets
      See Also:
      CheckoutRequest, UserOrder

    • clearCart

      public org.springframework.http.HttpStatus clearCart()
      Clears content of the user's cart
      Returns:
      Returns HttpStatus.NO_CONTENT which tells that the cart was cleared
